title: 【不二菌的作业】句子改错。
author: 我不二耶
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
不二你又让我做卷子
而且是我最害怕的纠错题
擦 我弃考！ 滑稽

replies.author: winsheng7770
replies.txt_content:
1.I have a pen.
2.I have an apple.
3.He is eating/He eats.
4.I ate the apple/I eat the apple.
5.Learning English is a good habit.

1.His name is Li Ming
2.Who are you?
3.Why did you do this?
4.Can you watch TV?
5.I didn't eat the apple.

1.Do you like to do sports?
2.What kind of films are most popular in your country?
3.Do you live in a house or a flat?
4.Do you like your neighbourhood?
5.We have such busy schedules at school, so we just grab a quick bite to eat at the restaurant while catching up with each other.

replies.author: winsheng7770
replies.txt_content:
我不二耶 发表于 2017-1-2 10:24
试着挑战找些其它解法吧~比如
1-3 He is to eat.（不定式作宾语）
2-1 The name of the man is Li Ming. ...
表示He is to eat 并没用过的说
然后The name of the man 感觉太啰嗦
如果有人问 What is the man's name?
我们一般回答 His name is xxx.

replies.author: Because.
replies.txt_content:
I have a pen.
I have an apple.
He is eating.
I eat the apple.
Learn English is a good habit.

His name is Li Ming.
Who are you?
Why did you do this?
Can you watch TV?
I didn't eat the apple.

Do you like sports?
What kind of film are most popular in your country?
Do you live in a house or a flat?
Do you like your neighborhood?
We have such busy schedules at school, so we just grab a quick bite to eat at the restaurants while catching up with each other.





--------“如果没有体会到同样的痛苦的话，是无法真正理解对方的。”
            “即便真正理解了，也不意味着一定能志同道合。”
            “这就是，事实。”

replies.author: 我的工业2
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 我不二耶 于 2017-1-2 10:27 编辑


答对1个一金粒，全对20金粒！
小学：
1.I have a pen.
2.I have an apple.
3.He is eating.
4.I ate the apple.
5.Learning the English is a good habit.
初中：
1.His name's Li ming.
2.Who are you?
3.Why did you do this?
4.Can you watch TV?
5.I didn't eat the apple.
高中及大学：
1.Do you like doing sports? 
2.What kinds of films are most popular in your country?
3.Do you live in a house or a flat?
4.Do you like your neighborhood?
5.We have such busy schedules at school, so we just grab a quick bite to eat at the restaurants while catching up with each other.
难度升级！
1.He has worked.
2.Have you found your lost pen yet?
3.I looked forward to eating the apple.
4.This kind of apple isn't still here.
5.There will be an apple.

讲道理，难度升级的题没有语境很难做
另外高中及大学简直小儿科

replies.author: EisakaFuine
replies.txt_content: I have a pen. I have an apple. He is eating. I eat the apple. Learn English is a good habit.  His name is Li Ming. Who are you? Why did you do this? Can you watch TV? I didn't eat the apple.  Do you like sports? What kind of film are most popular in your country? Do you live in a house or a flat? Do you like your neighborhood? We have such busy schedules at school, so we just grab a quick bite to eat at the restaurants while catching up with each other.
